page.title: 17Higham Farm
page.content: When we went to Higham Farm to see the lady there, she was very busy because the man had unexpectedly turned up to{shear the sheep. }He was using electric clippers, and she was helping by getting the next sheep ready. Each sheep took a very short time, and the fleece was tied up with- out a string because that would damage the{machinery}that would be used on it. One of the three dogs was a {sheepdog,}and rounded up some sheep very cleverly when they escaped. We walked through the farmyard and we saw the pond: there were three cats and three geese. One of the geese was laying. They have a lot of sheep and some cattle for fattening. The farm's{oast has no roof and is not in use except for storage.
